lead_paragraph: Patric Hornqvist scored twice and Sweden fended off Belarus, 6-5, in an opening preliminary-round game in Group A of the world championships in Quebec City. In the other Group A game, Switzerland defeated France, 4-1.
snippet: Patric Hornqvist scored twice and Sweden fended off Belarus, 6-5, in an opening preliminary-round game in Group A of the world championships in Quebec City. In the other Group A game, Switzerland defeated France, 4-1.
